DOC.brief_title: Granisetron Diabetic Parturients Decrease Spinal Induced Hypotension
DOC.detailed_description: Introduction : Spinal anesthesia consider first choice cesarean section absolute relative contraindication . It easy low risk mother baby case . Anesthetists , especially junior staff , prefer spinal anesthesia cesarean section avoid manage airway insert endotracheal tube usually difficult full term pregnant woman . Hypotension follow spinal anesthesia usually occur due blockade sympathetic vasomotor activity accentuate compression aorta inferior vena cava gravid uterus patient supine position . It start soon intrathecal injection local anesthetic may extend till end block put anesthesia team explanatory situation . The pathophysiology spinal hypotension mainly due sympathetic blockade predominate pararsympathetic power dilate blood vessel subsequent blood pooling dilate blood vessel ( mainly venous side ) . Sudden bradycardia occur shift cardiac autonomic balance toward parasympathetic system activation leave ventricular mechanoreceptors chemoreceptor Bezold Jarisch reflex ( BJR ) increase baroreflex activity . [ 1 ] Serotonin release low-volume state suggest possible trigger BJR . [ 2 ] Granisetron 5-Hydoxy Tryptamine 3 ( 5-HT3 ) receptor antagonist effective prevent nausea vomit . Diabetes mellitus widespread disease increase risk cardiovascular disease intraoperative mortality . Diabetes associate increase risk perioperative hypotension due autonomic neuron system dysfunction associate micro macro complication long stand hyperglycemia . The effect preganglionic sympathetic fiber cardiac sympathetic innervation blockade occur spinal anesthesia cardiac autonomic neuron function expect different diabetic patient normal patient . In large cohort patient type 1 type 2 diabetes , Ziegler et al . [ 3 ] , use predefined heart rate variability ( HRV ) test spectral analysis R-R interval , find 25.3 % patient type 1 diabetes 34.3 % patient type 2 diabetes abnormal finding . Clinical symptom autonomic dysfunction may appear long diabetes onset . However , subclinical cardiac neuropathic dysfunction , manifest change HRV , may detect within 1 year diagnosis type II diabetes within 2 year diagnosis type I diabetes . [ 4 ] The incidence hypotension define systolic blood pressure le 90 mm Hg bradycardia define heart rate le 50 beat/minute haemodynamic adverse effect spinal anesthesia non-obstetric patient report 33 % 13 % respectively . [ 5,6 ] Aim work : This study investigate effect antiemetic drug Granisetron ( G Setron 1 mg 1 ml ampule ) reduce incidence hypotension occur spinal anesthesia type I diabetic patient arrange cesarean section . Material Methods : This study randomize double blind anesthetist ' , data collector patient blind assigned group . After hospital ethic committee approval write informed consent , 68 type I diabetic patient schedule cesarean section participate study Operation Theater Suez Canal University Hospitals . All participate patient randomly classify two equal group , ( G ) Granisetron group ( P ) Placebo group . The primary outcome incidence Hypotension define SBP < 90 mmHg occur spinal anesthesia type I diabetic patient arrange caesarean section . A total 68 type I diabetic full term pregnant woman enrol caesarean section delivery spinal anesthesia include study . Approval institutional medical committee write consent patient obtain . Inclusion criterion include diabetic ( Type I ) ladies age 21 year old arrange elective caesarean section spinal anesthesia . Exclusion criterion include contraindication spinal anesthesia ( like bleed diathesis regional infection site neuroaxial block ) , know allergy Granisetron local anaesthetic ( heavy bupivacaine , Marcaine Spinal 0.5 % Heavy , 5mg/ml , AstraZeneca ampule ) , chronic hypertension , pregnancy induce hypertension , congenital rheumatic heart disease , antepartum haemorrhage , Fetal destress gestational age < 36 week . All patient randomly classify two equal group ( 34 patient ) : G group receive 1 mg Granisetron ( G Setron , 1 mg/ml Egyptian Pharmaceutical Company ) intravenously dilute 10 ml normal saline 10 minute spinal anesthesia , P group receive 10 ml normal saline N.S placebo consider time color solution . Randomization perform use computer base random number generator seal envelope open till inform consent obtain . The study double-blind anesthetist , data collector patient know assignment group . The syrinx Granisetron placebo prepare anesthetist inform study protocol . All patient infuse 500 ml lactate ringer intravenously IV . Premedication 30 ml 0.15 molar solution sodium citrate give orally 15-30 minute surgery addition Ranitidine ampule ( Zantac ) 50 mg dilute 10 ml N.S give intravenously slowly . Base line heart rate ( HR ) mean arterial blood pressure ( MABP ) reading measure spinal anesthesia . Spinal anesthesia perform sit position use 25-gauge spinal needle ( B BRAUN Co. ) L3-L4 L4-L5 lumbar interspaces , 12.5 mg ( 2.5 ml volume ) 0.5 % hyperbaric Bupivcaine ( Marcaine Spinal 0.5 % Heavy , 5mg/ml , AstraZeneca ampule ) inject intrathecally 1 minute . After spinal anesthesia , parturient place operating table supine position 15° leave lateral tilt supplemental oxygen face mask 5 L per min . Sensory level evaluate test cold sensation , motor block assess accord Bromage scale 5 min . HR mean arterial blood pressure record every 3 min end surgery . Blood pressure measure every 3 min Ephedrine 10 mg bolus use hypotension ( Mean blood pressure 65 mmHg ) control predetermine protocol follow . Maintenance fluid lactate Ringer 's solution give rate 10 ml/kg/h group surgical procedure . An additional rapid bolus infusion ( 100 ml ) lactate Ringer 's pushed episode hypotension . 10 mg ephedrine administer MBP le 65 mmHg . A second dose 10 mg ephedrine repeat hypotension persist 5 min recur . Phenylephrine consider persistent hypotension respond ephedrine . If bradycardia occur defined HR low 60 beat per min 0.5 mg atropine consider unless associate hypotension , ephedrine choice . Demographic data patient ( Age , Height , Weight , BMI , duration procedure , duration diabetes , Glycosylated Hemoglubin , parity ) record . Incidence hypotension calculate compare group . Other useful information incidence bradycardia ( HR < 50 beat/minute ) atropine , ephedrine , phenylephrine administer dos record . DOC.criteria: Type I diabetic patient Parturients present Cesarean section Contraindications spinal anesthesia ( like bleed diathesis regional infection site neuroaxial block ) Known allergy Granisetron local anaesthetic ( heavy bupivacaine , Marcaine Spinal 0.5 % Heavy , 5mg/ml , AstraZeneca ampule ) Pregnancy induce hypertension Congenital rheumatic heart diseases Antepartum haemorrhage Fetal destress gestational age < 36 week
